0010011000101111 0101010111000000 1 -> sum: 0111101111110000, cout: 0

1010110111100000 1011010011100000 0 -> sum: 0110001011000000, cout: 1
0010101011111000 1010111010100000 0 -> sum: 1101100110011000, cout: 0
